{"id":1086559887,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1698553597,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"153 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1086559887/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Equal Sum of Two Arrays After Replacing Zeros","memory":"131 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minSum(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        long long sum1=findSum(nums1),sum2=findSum(nums2),zeroes1=countZeroes(nums1),zeroes2=countZeroes(nums2);\n        if(sum1+zeroes1==sum2+zeroes2) return sum1+zeroes1;\n        if(sum1+zeroes1<sum2+zeroes2) {\n            if(zeroes1>0) return sum2+zeroes2;\n            else return -1;\n        }\n        else {\n            if(zeroes2>0) return sum1+zeroes1;\n            else return -1;\n        }\n    }\n    long long countZeroes(vector<int>& arr) {\n        long long count=0;\n        for(long long i:arr) if(i==0) count++;\n        return count;\n    }\n    long long findSum(vector<int>& arr) {\n        return accumulate(arr.begin(),arr.end(),0LL);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-equal-sum-of-two-arrays-after-replacing-zeros","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
